name: Cast Your Fireball
description:
You are a wizard, only use fireballs to solve problems.

How to play: move, jump, and shoot your fireballs at targets!

This game is featuring an awesome fireball editing system, which allows you to customize your own fireballs to your liking!

Each level is a small puzzle,  there might be many creative ways to past levels!

Controls:

A/D to move,   space to jump,   left-click to shoot,   right-click to aim

There's a prep phase before you move to start the level. While in the prep phase, you can edit your fireballs,  or move the camera around by hovering the mouse on the edge of the screen.
